attributes.action: stop planning proposal for New Buisnessess, Park and Ride, Hotel at M40 Gateway,  Handy Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition will be to stop the go ahead with the proposal for the New M40 Gateway project at Handy Cross, which if given the approval will create more traffic chaos, pollution, possible theft increase within the community, not to mention a possible drop in local property prices. Also our overall view from our homes along with increased possible noise levels.
